1470278170431541248.full_text:
#China holds national memorial ceremony for #NanjingMassacre victims. The Massacre took place when Japanese invading troops captured then capital city of China on Dec. 13, 1937.

Over six weeks, more than 300,000 Chinese civilians and unarmed soldiers were brutally killed.

1470376158655320070.full_text: Today is the national memorial day for the victims of the #NanjingMassacre . On December 13, 1937, Japanese troops captured the city of Nanjing, where around 300,000 Chinese civilians and unarmed soldiers were brutally killed in over six weeks. The history will never be forgotten https://t.co/69wsbscRLp

1470384267754721292.full_text: #OtD 13 Dec 1937 the Nanjing massacre began when Imperial Japanese troops captured the city which was then the capital of China and began six weeks of murder, looting and rape which left 40-300,000 people dead https://t.co/0Q9bxvcfnd

1470377765186654209.full_text: 1937年，在日军进攻南京的前夕，约翰·拉贝发起建立南京安全区。他奋不顾身、不顾危险地抗议和尽其所能地阻止侵华日军对中国人民施暴。安全区为大约25万中国平民提供暂时栖身避难场所。 #国家公祭日 #南京大屠杀 #NanjingMassacre #China https://t.co/0UmgRbeWhv
